title: Noam Chomsky: Should Ukraine Turn Into Mexico to End The War?
description:
Noam Chomsky: A Diplomatic Settlement to Neutralize Ukraine, similar to Mexico or Austria, could potentially end the war in Ukraine — and save thousands of lives.

What are your thoughts?

——
